tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE restoration_progress (
  restoration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  progress_date DATE,
  milestone VARCHAR(255),
  photo_path VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE restoration_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restoration_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restoration_id) REFERENCES restoration_progress (restoration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_photos (
    photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restoration_id INT,
    photo BYTEA,
    photo_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restoration_id) REFERENCES restoration_progress (restoration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_milestones (
    milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    milestone_description TEXT,
    completion_date DATE,
    restoration_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restoration_id) REFERENCES restoration_progress (restoration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restoration_id INT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restoration_id) REFERENCES restoration_progress (restoration_id)
);
